original: Åslund, Carl Alfred, disponent, Skedalagård, f. 2/7/94 i Ramundeboda, Örebro 1. G. 44 m. Valborg Wester-mark. Barn: Per Lennart, Valborg Elisabet. — Realex. i Karlstad 10. Kor-resp. v. Laxå Bruk 10-16, sekr. v. Hellefors Bruk 17-18, inköpschef v. Gunnebo Bruk 19-21, disp. v. Halmstads Spik- o. Trådverk 22-29, start. A-B Matador verken i Halmstad 30, disp. o. verkst. dir. där fr. 30, start, ett dotterföret. i Belg. 35. Styr:led. i A-B Maskinfabr. Rex, Klubbensborgs A-B i Sthlm o. A-B Swed. Steel Mfg Co. i Halmstad. Hobbies: jakt, fiske.
translated: Åslund, Carl Alfred, manager, Skedalagård, b. 2/7/94 in Ramundeboda, Örebro 1. Married in 1944 to Valborg Wester-mark. Children: Per Lennart, Valborg Elisabet. — Attended Realex in Karlstad until 1910. Correspondent at Laxå Bruk from 1910-1916, secretary at Hellefors Bruk from 1917-1918, purchasing manager at Gunnebo Bruk from 1919-1921, manager at Halmstads Spik- o. Trådverk from 1922-1929. Founded A-B Matador works in Halmstad in 1930, served as manager and managing director there from 1930. Established a subsidiary company in Belgium in 1935. Board member of A-B Maskinfabr. Rex, Klubbensborgs A-B in Sthlm, and A-B Swed. Steel Mfg Co. in Halmstad. Hobbies: hunting, fishing.
